Title: Machete
Overview: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.
Tagline: He was given an offer he couldn't refuse...
Keywords: illegal immigration, immigration law, machete, politician, death of a child, hard to kill, brutal death
production_companies: Dune Entertainment, Dune Entertainment III, Troublemaker Studios, Overnight Films
Cast: Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Jessica Alba
